task.title: How do I invite someone to a chat I'm already having?
task.shortdesc: If you are in a text chat with one chat partner, you can quickly invite someone to join the chat.

step.cmd: Click in an open chat window to invite someone to a chat you are already having.
Specify the Topic for the group chat.
In the Find a person or group field, enter the names of the contacts to add to the invitation.
Select Allow new chat invitees to see previous chat transcript when they join the chat to enable a contact who joins the conversation to see the previous chat history.

info.note: To enable this option, you must select to automatically save chats in chat history preferences. Changes will take effect the next time you open a new chat.

step.cmd: Click Send to send the invitation to join the chat to that person.

postreq.p: After the person accepts the invitation, all chat partners display in the chat window and can chat with one another.
